newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Visio started with buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Visio started with buy.

text.p: - Pacific Crest Securities said it initiated coverage of Visio Corp with a buy rating.
- Analyst Rob Owens said in a brief report that the brokerage expects the software company to post compound annual growth of 45 percent over the next three to five years.
- A major upgrade of the company's three existing products is expects in the September quarter, he said.
- Earnings were estimated at $1.30 a share for the current fistal year and $1.85 for fiscal 1998, compared with $0.76 last year.
